arts.ttl: Ryan Shawcross delivers Mark Robins verdict and reveals why new Stoke City boss wasn't at Turf Moor
arts.sum: Ryan Shawcross says Stoke City are in good hands as he hands over the reins to Mark Robins. He said: "I spoke to the lads after and talked about saying before the Sunderland game how they had to make sure they were proud when they walked off the pitch.

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Stoke City as 4/10 dished out following inexplicable red card - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley started 2025 with a frustrating goalless draw at home to Stoke City.

arts.ttl: 'He's let the team down': Scott Parker reacts to Hannibal's red and Burnley's frustrating Stoke City draw
arts.sum: Scott Parker conceded his Burnley side fell short during their frustrating goalless draw at home to Stoke City – while claiming Hannibal let the team down following his inexplicable red.

arts.ttl: Stoke appoint ex-Coventry boss Robins as manager
arts.sum: Stoke City appoint former Coventry boss Mark Robins as their new manager on a three-and-a-half-year deal.

arts.ttl: Stoke player ratings vs Burnley as Ryan Shawcross hands over rejuvenated side
arts.sum: Stoke might have won it in injury time again when Gallagher got on the end of a Junho free-kick and sent a header across the face of goal and wide. Stoke started the second-half with energy and Moran had a shot blocked after being teed up by Junior Tchamadeu before Tchamadeu flicked a Moran pass on for Cannon to blast a left footer from inside the area on target but saved by Trafford.

arts.ttl: Hannibal sent off as Burnley and Stoke draw
arts.sum: Ryan Shawcross' interim spell as Stoke manager ended with a creditable goalless draw at Burnley that dented the hosts' automatic promotion bid.

arts.ttl: Burnley held to home stalemate by stubborn Stoke
arts.sum: Mark Robins was announced as the new Potters boss on the morning of the game.

arts.ttl: Burnley 0-0 Stoke City: Lethargic Clarets draw another home blank as Hannibal sees red
arts.sum: Burnley drew another home blank following a lethargic New Year’s Day encounter against Stoke City.

arts.ttl: 'What are you thinking?! | Ex-Man Utd player Hannibal sees red for stamp
arts.sum: Burnley midfielder Hannibal Mejbri was sent off for stamping on Stokes' Junior Tchamadeu.

arts.ttl: 25 images of Burnley fans arriving at Turf Moor for New Year's Day fixture against Stoke City
arts.sum: Burnley fans have arrived at Turf Moor for the Championship fixture against Stoke City.
